```pddl
[
  (:action make ; Make a connection or creation process for an item
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (not (connected ?actor ?item)) (has_item ?actor ?item))
    :effect (connected ?actor ?item)
  ),
  (:action find
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (not (found ?actor ?item)))
    :effect (found ?actor ?item)
  ),
  (:action check
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (not (checked ?actor ?resource)))
    :effect (checked ?actor ?resource)
  ),
  (:action talk
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?mic - microphone ?voice - voice ?advice - advice)
    :precondition (and (microphone_connected ?actor ?mic) 
                       (panel_checked ?actor voice_panel) 
                       (not (talking ?actor ?voice)) 
                       (not (advising ?actor ?advice)))
    :effect (and (talking ?actor ?voice) 
                 (advising ?actor ?advice))
  ),
  (:action use_microphone
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?voice - voice)
    :precondition (and (talking ?actor ?voice) (not (using_microphone ?actor ?voice)))
    :effect (using_microphone ?actor ?voice)
  ),
  (:action use ; Use a resource and update usage status
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (not (using ?actor ?resource)))
    :effect (using ?actor ?resource)
  )
]
```
